name: cru_tmp_yearly_mean
title: Yearly Mean Temperature - CRU TS
description: Yearly temperature from Climate Research Unit (CRU)
details: Created by aggregating (mean) monthly mean daily temperature data from CRU TS

extract_types_info.max: maximum temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total temperature of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Harris et al.(2014) Updated high‐resolution grids of monthly climatic observations – the CRU TS3.10 Dataset. doi:10.1002/joc.3711
